item.description:
You'll learn how to be more attractive - physically, emotionally, spiritually, intellectually, athletically, aesthetically, etc. to the people you want to attract. You'll be developing yourself at the same time in these areas. Learn how to read body cues, listen for what is attractive and how to encourage people to be attractive to you also.

What is attraction? That will be explored in depth. Is it something missing in you? Something that you want to develop in yourself? Something that reminds you of someone else? Something that you are "completing" in someone else?

Sliding scale of $20-40. 7:00-9:30pm. Traditional cost of Herb's workshops have been 40 and trying to make it accessible to everyone. If you can pay more than 20 it helps those who might not be able to afford 20.

Herb Pearce is a relationship coach of 30 years for couples, singles and families. His specialty is working with personality differences and ways to bridge differences and enhance relationships.
www.herbpearce.com
herb@herbpearce.com
visit his other meetup group at
Enneagram-Group of Personality Differences.
781 648 3737
item.name: How to Attract a Special Friend, Lover, Mate
